# MÃ¡xima La Pitonisa del Amor - Landing Page

## Project Overview

This is a Next.js TypeScript project for a mystical love fortune teller landing page. The site features a cosmic theme with dark backgrounds, golden accents, and red highlights.

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- ShadCN UI Components
- Lucide React Icons
- Google Fonts (Cinzel Decorative, Literata)

## Color Scheme

- Background: Almost black (0 0% 4%)
- Foreground: White (0 0% 98%)
- Primary: Gold (45 92% 45%)
- Accent: Red (0 84% 60%)
- Card: Dark gray (0 0% 8%)
- Border: (0 0% 20%)

## Key Components

- CosmicBackground: Animated cosmic background with nebula and twinkling stars
- Service Cards: Four mystical service cards with hover effects
- WhatsApp CTA: Prominent call-to-action button
- Responsive design for all screen sizes

## Development Guidelines

- Use TypeScript for all components
- Follow responsive design principles
- Implement smooth animations and hover effects
- Maintain mystical and professional aesthetic
- Ensure accessibility and performance
